thread.title: Anyone travelling to Tawang on 21 Oct 2015??
thread.title_full: Anyone travelling to Tawang on 21 Oct 2015??

author: Vikram Doshi
title: Anyone travelling to Tawang on 21 Oct 2015??
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Arunachal Pradesh » Anyone travelling to Tawang on 21 Oct 2015?? Anyone travelling to Tawang on 21 Oct 2015?? # 1 Heyy guys I am backpacking to tawang this week - so it would be nice to have company (and share costs specially to go to Bumla Pass, PTso lake etc) My rough itinierary is as follows 21st Oct Guwahati to Tezpur AC bus from airport to city (closest to ISBT) Take sharing jeep to ISBT ASTC counter - take bus to Tezpur (5 hours) 22nd Oct Tezpur to Bomdila Take sumo from Tezpur bus stand reach before 9 pm 23rd Oct Bomdila to Tawang prior booking requird sharing jeep again to Tawang start at 5:30 from Himalaya travels counter in the main market takes 7 hours Do not halt at Dirang because no sharing jeeps start from there 24th Oct Tawang Local sightseeing + get permit from Tawang district office for Bumla Pass 25th Oct Tawang
